tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name STRING,
  location STRING,
  is_armed BOOL,
  trigger_event STRING
);

CREATE TABLE security_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(20),
    installed_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE security_triggers (
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_type VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_condition VARCHAR(100),
    action_to_perform VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE security_triggers (
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name TEXT,
    trigger_type TEXT,
    trigger_condition TEXT,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name TEXT,
    action_type TEXT,
    action_details TEXT,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_home_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    room_id INT,
    status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE triggers (
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_type VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_condition VARCHAR(255),
    action VARCHAR(255),
    device_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE trigger_devices(
    trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name STRING,
    trigger_type STRING,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES smart_home_devices(device_id)
);
